footer-about-content: H.B.M STONE CO. LTD. is a professional stone production, sales, and construction as one integrated enterprise, after years of unremitting efforts and the vast majority of customers care, expanding business scale, has become the hearts of our customers with a good reputation of the manufacturers.

contact-us-content: Get in touch with us to know our latest products and offers
name: Name
about-us-content-first: is a professional stone production, sales, and construction as one of the integrated enterprises, after years of unremitting efforts and the vast majority of customers care, expanding business scale, has become the hearts of our customers with a good reputation of the manufacturers.
about-us-content-second: Our company has a wide range of products in all kinds of granite, marble, and artificial stone, with special-shaped, waterjet medallions and processing. The stone is widely used in a variety of indoor and outdoor decorations, such as hotels, walls, squares, gardens, temples, municipal all roads, and other constructions. With the years exported to Central Asia, Europe, and the United States, we wholeheartedly welcome friends both at home and abroad to visit our company, in guidance, cooperation, and common development.
chairman-content: the chairman of H.B.M( Hassan Building Material ) Stone, doing business for over 17 years in stone with 9 departments of family groups, and factories around the country. There is a marble factory in Sharjah Industrial Area 15 (H.B.M STONE CO. LTD.) Ceramics factory Sharjah Old Sajja  Industrial Area (EXPORT CO. LTD.), special shaped column, etc. Besides DRAGON MALL, GA ZONE building material market in DUBAI-UAE, 1 is owned by a mine in DUBAI-UAE.
